argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscyg.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | iscyg.2 | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | iscyg3.e | |- E = { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = B } |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( x = X /\ n e. ZZ ) -> x = X ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( x = X /\ n e. ZZ ) -> ( n .x. x ) = ( n .x. X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( x = X -> ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_rneqd | |- ( x = X -> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( x = X -> ( ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = B <-> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = B ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( X e. E <-> ( X e. B /\ ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. X ) ) = B ) ) |
